scripts.build: (cd shared && yarn build) && (cd client && yarn build)
scripts.install: (cd shared && yarn install) && (cd client && yarn install) && (cd server && yarn install)
scripts.start: (cd shared && yarn build) && (concurrently "kill-port 5000 && cd server && PORT=5000 yarn start" "cd client && PORT=3000 && sleep 2 && yarn start")
